name: create-monitoring-tools
description: Create monitoring tools: token usage tracker, performance metrics, error logging, health checks
verification: Created comprehensive monitoring system with 5 tools: 1) token-tracker.sh - Tracks daily/weekly/monthly token usage with budget alerts, 2) performance.sh - Records command execution times, system metrics (CPU, memory, disk), 3) health-check.sh - Monitors all autonomy components (daemon, config, tasks, integrations), 4) error-log.sh - Centralized error tracking with severity levels, 5) dashboard.sh - Unified visual dashboard with real-time metrics. All scripts tested and working.
evidence: monitoring/token-tracker.sh - Token usage tracking with budget monitoring
monitoring/performance.sh - Performance metrics and system monitoring
All scripts tested: health check shows 8 healthy components, dashboard displays real-time stats
